Class FlagCheckPrecondition

  • public class FlagCheckPrecondition
extends Precondition
    A precondition that checks the value of a flag.
    Author:
    Richard Corfield <m0rjc@m0rjc.me.uk>

      boolean accepts(Variable variable, int value)
